front.title: A Uniform Resource Name (URN) Namespace for The Near Field Communication Forum (NFC Forum)

abstract.t: This document describes the Namespace Identifier (NID) for Uniform Resource Namespace (URN) resources published by the Near-Field Communication Forum (NFC Forum). The NFC Forum defines and manages resources that utilize this URN identification model. Management activities for these and other resource types are provided by the NFC Forum Technical Committee.
